task.summary: Fixed package-private access to classes in Purchases Adapter
Fixed errors with FrameLayout and its starting gravity position
Fixed errors with RecyclerView and binding it with the adapter causing the fragment and application to crash on start.
Fixed errors with RecyclerView and binding it to the Room database in order for the fragment to access its data.

Fixed errors with RecyclerView and binding it with the adapter causing the fragment and application to crash on start.
Fixed errors with RecyclerView and binding it to the Room database in order for the fragment to access its data.
